title: Strawberry Key Lime Pie Requires:  This recipe requires one baked, 8-inch pie crust; either homemade or purchased.
ingredients: Â½ cup fresh key lime juice
2 egg whites, beaten to stiff peaks
1 pint fresh strawberries, sliced and sprinkled with (at least 1 tablespoon) sugar
instructions: Mix the lime juice with the sweetened condensed milk and stir until the mixture is well mixed.  Fold in the beaten egg whites into the condensed milk mixture carefully but fully then pour the mixture into the prepared pie crust and refrigerate.
When the lime/condensed milk mixture has set, and you are ready to serve, distribute the strawberries over the pie.  Cut and serve.
Source:  Sublime Key Lime by Bonnie Walker, Express-News Staff Writer, Food Section, Recipe from Universal Press, San Antonio Express-News, Wednesday, August 31, 2005.
